entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 04:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: SSW 30 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 5 except low 9 inland.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near plus 5 except low 9 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few showers changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm except 50 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
